translation.home.title: Lithulusi Lekuhlola Kwehlukana Kwedijithali
translation.home.hero.title: Lithulusi Lekuhlola Kwehlukana Kwedijithali
translation.home.hero.subtitle: Kunika emandla Imifelandzawonye Ngekusebentisa Lushintsho Lwedijithali
translation.home.hero.description: Lithulusi leliphelele lelisuka ku-DGRV ne-BMZ lekusita imifelandzawonye ukukala, kuhlatiya, nokuvala emagebe ekwenziwa kwedijithali ngekuhlola kwamasu kanye nezincomo letisebentako.
translation.home.features.title: Tici Letibalulekile
translation.home.features.description: Konkhe lokudzingako kute uqhube luhambo lwedijithali lwemfelandzawonye wakho.
translation.home.features.assessmentDescription: Kuhlola lokuphelele kuto tonkhe timbono letibalulekile leti-8 ukukala lizinga lakho lamanje lokuvutfwa kwedijithali.
translation.home.features.planningDescription: Chaza simo sakho sedijithali lesihlosiwe bese udala emasu lasebentako ukuvala emagebe.
translation.home.features.trackingDescription: Gada luhambo lwakho lwelushintsho lwedijithali ngekucatsanisa kweminyaka kanye netinkhomba tekusebenta.
translation.home.benefits.title: Kungani Ukhetsa Lithulusi Letfu?
translation.home.benefits.empowermentDescription: Yakhelwe ngalokukhethekile imifelandzawonye eNingizimu Afrika nangale kwayo.
translation.home.benefits.securityDescription: Kuphepha kwelizinga lebhizinisi ngekugcinwa kwedatha lokubethelwe kanye netipele letijwayelekile.
translation.home.benefits.accessibilityDescription: Isebenza ku-inthanethi nalapho ungekho ku-inthanethi, ilungiselelwe tindzawo letine-bandwidth lephansi.
translation.home.partners.title: Itfutfukiswe Ngekusekelwa Ngu
translation.home.partners.bmzDescription: Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development
translation.home.cta.title: Ukulungele Kushintsha Imfelandzawonye Yakho?
translation.home.cta.description: Cala luhambo lwakho lwelushintsho lwedijithali namuhla bese uvula ematfuba lamasha ekukhula nekusebenta kahle.
translation.onboarding.step1.title: Hlola kwamanje kwakho
translation.onboarding.step1.description: Hlola ngekushesha kutsi imfelandzawonye yakho imi kuphi namuhla kuluhambo lwayo lwelushintsho lwedijithali.
translation.onboarding.step2.title: Chaza likusasa lakho
translation.onboarding.step2.description: Beka umbono wakho welizinga lekwenziwa kwedijithali lofuna kulifinyelela bese wakha luhlelo lwakho.
translation.onboarding.step3.title: Hlatiya Imiphumela &
translation.onboarding.step3.description: Tfola tincomo letenzelwe wena kanye nemasu lasebentako kute uqhube imfelandzawonye yakho.
translation.onboarding.completion.title: Ukulungele Kucala!
translation.onboarding.completion.subtitle: Luhambo lwakho lwekwenziwa kwedijithali lucala manje. Asishintshe imfelandzawonye yakho ngemininingwane lecondziswa yidatha kanye nekuhlela kwamasu.

translation.adminDashboard.managementTools.title: Amathulusi Ekulawula
translation.adminDashboard.managementTools.descripti: Finyelela izingxenye ezahlukene zesistimu ukuze uzilawule.

translation.adminDashboard.manageDigitalGaps.descrip: Dala, hlela, uphinde ulawule emagebe edijithali

translation.adminDashboard.recentSubmissions.descrip: Irekhodi lemisebenti yakamuva kanye nemicimbi yesistimu.
translation.manageActionPlan.title: Lawula Luhlelo Lwekusebenta
translation.manageActionPlan.description: Lapha kulapho ulawula khona luhlelo lwekusebenta.

translation.manageRecommendations.title: Lawula Tincomo
translation.manageRecommendations.description: Engeta, hlela, nobe susa tincomo tekuhlola kwehlukana kwedijithali

translation.answerDimensionAssessment.submitError: Kwehluleke kutfumela kuhlola. Sicela uzame futsi.
translation.answerDimensionAssessment.invalidLevelEr: Kukhetfwe lizinga lelingekho emtsetfweni. Sicela uzame futsi.
translation.manageCooperations.title: Lawula Kubambisana
translation.manageCooperations.description: Engeta uphinde ulawule amaphrofayili emifelandzawonye kanye nedatha

translation.assessmentDetailPage.title: Kuhlola Kwehlukana Kwedijithali
translation.assessmentDetailPage.welcomeDescription: Hlola imfelandzawonye yakho kuto tonkhe timbono letibalulekile tedijithali leti-{{count}}. Chofoza likhadi langentasi kute ucale kuhlola kwakho.
translation.actionPlanPage.title: Luhlelo lwekusebenta lwa {{name}}
translation.actionPlanPage.subtitle: Landzelela tento takho kusuka ku “Kufanele Kwentiwe” kuya ku “Kuvunyiwe”.
translation.actionPlansListPage.title: Emasu Ekusebenta
translation.actionPlansListPage.subtitle: Buka uphinde ulawule onkhe emasu akho ekusebenta
translation.manageSubmissions.accessDenied.title: Kufinyelela Kunqatshiwe
translation.manageSubmissions.accessDenied.message: Awunayo imvume yekubuka kutfunyelwa. Sicela utsintsane nemlawuli wakho.
translation.manageSubmissions.error.title: Liphutsa ekulayisheni kutfunyelwa
translation.manageSubmissions.empty.byOrg: Akukho kutfunyelwa lokutfolakele kwalokuhlola enhlanganweni yakho.
translation.manageSubmissions.empty.byCoop: Akukho kutfunyelwa lokutfolakele kwalokuhlola ekubambisaneni kwakho.
